Sifttter Redux Update: New Markdown Support

The original Sifttter allows only for bulleted list items. Tonight, I pushed an update to Sifttter Redux that allows for any level of Markdown to exist in a journal entry.

This blog regularly features a Link Mash (a curated selection of links that I want to share with my readers). To date, the creation of the Link Mash has been painful: I store interesting URLs in an Evernote note and, when the time comes, manually create blog posts with that info.
